title: Heera Jadau Haaram with Emerald Pendant - The 'Vaishnavi' Collection
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds) with excellent clarity; Oval-cut Emerald of Zambian origin
features: This stunning Haaram features a meticulously crafted arrangement of Polki diamonds, each delicately set to maximize its brilliance. The diamond shapes are a mix of round and square, adding dimension to the piece. The central pendant showcases an oval Emerald, surrounded by a floral motif of Polki diamonds. The 'Vaishnavi' collection piece has square pendants studded with polki diamonds.
colors: Predominantly gold with the captivating sparkle of white (uncut) diamonds and the lush green of the emerald.
occasions: and upscale cultural events. A statement piece for brides (వధువు) during their Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం) or Seemantham (సీమంతం) ceremonies.
description: This Heera Jadau Haaram is a timeless masterpiece, blending traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. The Hyderabadi polish accentuates the gold's luster, while the Polki diamonds lend an unmatched sparkle. The emerald pendant adds a touch of regality and sophistication. A valuable heirloom to be passed down through generations, symbolizing prosperity and grace. The uncut polki diamonds are meticulously placed to have an alluring effect that is sure to mesmerize.
